name: Ellie The Giant Golem
description:
We couldn't finished the game yet.

Main goal is destroying all of 3 gems on the giant however not implemented yet.

To-Do List

  • Golem will be able to throw rocks by jumping
  • New defensive animations of golem to protect gems
  • Dying of golem
  • Dying of player
  • Attack sounds ,walking sounds, music

Controls

  • awsd for moving
  • e for throwing grappling hook
  • F10 to fullscreen
  • ESC to hide/show cursor

Team

  • cenullum (Programmer)
  • Hamit Akbas ( 3D Modeller)
